credit_line: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
title: Fork
description: Four curved tines, curved shoulders. Spiral-shaped neck, baluster-shaped towards the handle. Plain brass ferrule, round in section. Tapering handle, round in section, of white milk glass with Chinoiserie design in gold. A man with spear, landscape in background with trees and houses.
name: Fork
